label: Set up and configure Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Marketing (10 – 15%)

skills.label: Set up Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Marketing
items: Configure organizational, business management, and customization settings

skills.label: Configure other settings
items: View and manage keywords for an organization

skills.label: Manage data quality and privacy
items: Identify gdpr rules for individuals and organizations
Identify how microsoft dynamics 365 supports gdpr

skills.label: Integrate Microsoft Dynamics 365 for Marketing with other services
items: Integrate with the customer insights service
Use power bi to view microsoft dynamics 365 for marketing data
Identify how custom channels work with microsoft dynamics 365 for marketing

skills.label: Create and manage segments
items: Create market segments including dynamic, static, and suppression segments
View segment entities and relationships by using the explore hyperlink
Configure dynamic segments by using the designer
Combine segments using union, exclude, or intersect logic

skills.label: Create and manage subscription centers and lists
items: Identify usage scenarios for subscription lists
Add a subscription list to a form
Create a segment based on a subscription list

label: Create and manage marketing forms and pages (10 – 15%)

items: Create a marketing form by using a template
Create landing forms, subscription centers, and forward to a friend pages

skills.label: Create and manage marketing pages
items: Add form blocks to marketing pages
Apply a style to marketing pages
Integrate marketing pages with marketing emails
Create and use dynamic tests links

skills.label: Create and manage leads
items: Identify and describe stages in the lead life cycle
Synchronize leads from linkedin by using the linkedin connector
Create segments by using microsoft dynamics customer insights integration

skills.label: Assess sales readiness
items: Create fixed rule and behavior rule scoring conditions
Set up single and multiple condition models

skills.label: Create email messages
items: Create an email message by using a template
Use basic html markup to create email messages
Add dynamic content to email messages

skills.label: Publish and manage email messages
items: Preview messages by using the basic and inbox options

skills.label: Create journeys
items: Identify and describe journey template types
Implement activity and launch workflow options

skills.label: Publish and manage journeys

skills.label: Create events and webinars

skills.label: Manage webinars
items: Create event invitations, banners, and social media posts

items: View data in the survey dashboard
